base_description: Slim, white modern desk lamp with adjustable arm.
part_description: Consists of a circular base, vertical stand, and horizontal adjustable arm with a light source. The arm is elongated and slim, positioned at the top of the stand.
internal_interaction_description: The adjustable arm rotates around the vertical stand, allowing the light source to be directed at various angles. The base supports the stand, providing stability while the arm moves freely.
external_interaction_description: The lamp illuminates surfaces, ideal for desks or tables. It can be manually adjusted by users to focus light on specific areas. Its modern design complements contemporary interiors.
